lines.gurmukhi: sMg imil clY inribGn phUcY Gr; ibCrY qurq btvwro mwr fwr hYN [

Unknown.translation: Just as a man travelling in the company of others reaches home safely but one who gets separated, is robbed by dacoits and killed.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: jo sMg dy nwl iml ky cldw hY, auh inribGn Gr phuMcdw hY, jo ivCuV jwey, aus nUM rwh mwr lutyry J`t mwr sutdy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy bwr dIey Kyq Cuvq n imRg nr; CyfI Bey imRg pMKI Kyqih aujwr hYN [

Unknown.translation: Just as a fenced field cannot be touched by humans and animals but an unfenced field is destroyed by passers-by and animals.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ Kyq nUM vwV id`iqAwˆ hrn jwˆ mnu`K nhIˆ Cuh skdy, pr Ku`lHw CifAwˆ pSU, pMCI qy rwhgIr Kyq nUM aujwV idMdy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: ipMjrw mY sUAw jYsy rwm nwm lyq hyqu; inksiq iKn qwNih gRsq mMjwr hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as a parrot shouts Ram Ram when in a cage but as soon as it gets out of cage, it is pounced upon by a cat and is eaten away.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ ipMjry ivc ipAw qoqw pRym nwl rwm nwm rtdw hY, pr jy inkldw hY qwˆ ausy vyly ib`lI PV lYˆdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMg imil mn phucY shj Gir; ibcrq pMco dUq pRwn pirhwr hYN [582[

Unknown.translation: Similarly, the mind of a human being acquires higher spiritual state when it unites with God-like True Guru. But when separated from the True Guru, it wanders about and is destroyed (spiritually) by the five vices-lust, anger, avarice, attachment and prid

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqvyˆ swDU dy sMg nUM iml ky mn sihj Gr ivc phuMc jwˆdw hY pr jy Ku`lHw ivcry qwˆ pMjy dUq kwm kRoDwid pRwx nws kr idMdy hn ]582]
